channel.title: World Of Warcraft Questions
channel.description:
Hi uhm im thinking about buying World of Warcraft but first I wanted to know a Few Things about it first.
1: Do you have to buy anything else but the Disk? 2: Whats it like? 3: Is it set in Worlds like RuneScape 4: Anyone got some Images of the Ingame scene? 5: Could you post a few things about it? Please
Thanks

item.title: World Of Warcraft Questions
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:17, topic:291890”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=385701.msg2896719#msg2896719 date=1249256157]
Atleast I got them free
[/quote]

You can sign up for a 10 day free trial on their website. You can do it as many times as you like as long as you use different email addresses each time.[/quote]
0.0 I Wonder if I can Burn the Disk that my Cousin has

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

`Lewk_:

WoW is gay. Nuff said

No.

WoW is so fucking addicting. I signed up for the 10 day trial and I couldn’t get off it. I got level 13 in the first day and got like 2G. I’m not going to pay for it though; it’s way too expensive.

item.title: World Of Warcraft Questions
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:9, topic:291890”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=385701.msg2891966#msg2891966 date=1248960125]
Do you get alot of Items even if not Members Package?
[/quote]

There’s no such thing as a “Member’s Package” on WoW. Once you subscribe for a month or more, your opportunities and availabilities are infinite (In the WoW world). There are, however, tournaments held (And possibly other events) which require additional payments to participate in. Other than that… the world (…Of Warcraft) is your oyster.

Note: Double-posting is in breech of the rules here. If you wish to modify your thread by adding more information but no one else has posted after your previous post, simply edit the said previous post accordingly.[/quote]
^ Once again (now on a different topic) well said Brendan…

Read full topic

item.title: World Of Warcraft Questions
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:4, topic:291890”]Woah it looks cool as!

But like does it suck not having Membershop Package?[/quote]

There’re thousands (Most likely hundreds of thousands) of items available, so you’re almost always left aspiring for more. RuneScape2’s content in terms of item is not very impressive in comparison to WoW’s. Summarised answer: no, it doesn’t suck.

What does suck, though, is the price. I don’t think it’s worth it and, quite honestly, the rate of addiction pertaining to WoW is frightening. I advise against going anywhere near it unless you genuinely have a lot of time to kill and a poor social life.

Read full topic
